          <title>
            <string language="sl">Mesto, vas</string>
            <string language="en">Town, village</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stadt, Dorf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ville, village</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci sami preko natančnega opazovanja fotografij spoznajo razlike med mestom in vasjo.</string>
            <string language="en">Noticing the differences between two kind of settlement (town/village) on a photo.</string>

Regelung (town/village) auf einem Foto.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Noter les différences entre le genre deux de

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Notar las diferencias entre la clase dos del 
establecimiento (town/village) en una foto.</string>
